input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Unlit Dunhill Fir Tree"
Reference Product Description:
The Dunhill Fir is a full body tree featuring a generous number of branch tips for holding holiday trimmings. It is pre-strung with 650 clear lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This tree features hinged branch construction for ease of assembly. Sturdy folding metal tree stand is included.

This Dunhill Fir Full Artificial Green Christmas Tree is 6 feet tall with a 46 inch base diameter. Featuring hundreds of individually crafted branch tips to create full bodied branches, this tree is designed to look and feel lifelike.
Designed to look and feel lifelike, this tree is defined by its close attention to detail, featuring hundreds of individually crafted branch tips that make up the wide, full-bodied branches that create space for your lights and ornaments.
This tree features pre-attached, hinged branches that drop down for a simple set-up and fold back in for quick and convenient storage. Properly shape the tree by peeling back the branches and pulling the tips apart.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials, hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this tree is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Includes a durable metal base.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Northlight 4.5' Pre-Lit Buffalo Fir Full Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Natural Fraser Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Northlight 6.5' Pre-Lit Full Sierra Noble Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 9 ft. South Carolina Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with 750 LED Lights'
  - Name='Canyon Ranch Fir Artificial Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company 12 ft Pre-Lit Dunhill Fir Hinged Full Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Montgomery 6' Prelit Half Christmas Tree with 250 Clear Lights'
  - Name='LuxenHome 5ft Pre-Lit Full Artificial Flocked Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Puleo 4.5' Pre-Lit Aspen Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company 9 ft. Pre-Lit Jersey Frasier Fir Slim Hinged Artificial Christmas Tree with Clear'
  - Name='National Tree Company Oakley Hills Snow Slim Tree'
  - Name='Northlight 7.5' Pre-Lit Manchester Pine Instant Connect Artificial Christmas Tree Dual LED Lights'
  - Name='National Tree Company 7.5 ft. PowerConnect Kingswood Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with 360 Light Parade LED Lights'
  - Name='Puleo Pre-lit Artificial Christmas Tree Full Forest Fir'
  - Name='Puleo 7.5ft Pre-Lit Full Berkshire Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company 10 ft Pre-Lit Dunhill Fir Slim Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Kingswood Fir Pencil Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Majestic Fir Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Miniature Pine Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company 7.5-ft Pre-Lit Traditional Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company North Valley Spruce Pencil Slim Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company North Valley Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Duxbury Tree 7.5 ft.'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Slim Tree'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 4.5' Pre-Lit Buffalo Fir Full Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar pre-lit full artificial fir tree, slightly different fir species and smaller size, similar construction and function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Natural Fraser Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Also a full artificial fir tree from same brand, similar construction and purpose but a different fir species and not specified as pre-lit.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 6.5' Pre-Lit Full Sierra Noble Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Comparable pre-lit full artificial fir tree, close height and full branch construction, different fir species and brand.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 9 ft. South Carolina Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with 750 LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit full fir tree with similar features and larger size, different brand and specific fir type.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Canyon Ranch Fir Artificial Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial fir tree, likely full sized, no info on pre-lit or hinged branches, less certain about exact features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 12 ft Pre-Lit Dunhill Fir Hinged Full Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand, model, and fir type with pre-lit lights and hinged full construction, only difference is larger size.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Montgomery 6' Prelit Half Christmas Tree with 250 Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit but a half tree which differs significantly in silhouette and construction from full Dunhill Fir tree.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: LuxenHome 5ft Pre-Lit Full Artificial Flocked Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit full artificial tree but flocked and no fir species specified; construction likely different from Dunhill Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo 4.5' Pre-Lit Aspen Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit full artificial fir tree, smaller height but similar species type and functionality.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 9 ft. Pre-Lit Jersey Frasier Fir Slim Hinged Artificial Christmas Tree with Clear
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand pre-lit fir tree with hinged branches but slim silhouette differs from full Dunhill Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Oakley Hills Snow Slim Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and tree type but slim and snow-flocked style differs significantly from full Dunhill Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 7.5' Pre-Lit Manchester Pine Instant Connect Artificial Christmas Tree Dual LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit full artificial pine tree but different species and instant connect feature indicates some variation in construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 7.5 ft. PowerConnect Kingswood Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with 360 Light Parade LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand pre-lit fir tree with unique powerconnect lighting and different fir subtype, similar full construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo Pre-lit Artificial Christmas Tree Full Forest Fir
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit full artificial fir tree, likely similar function and silhouette though different brand and unspecified features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo 7.5ft Pre-Lit Full Berkshire Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar pre-lit full fir tree, different brand and fir subtype but comparable product type and features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 10 ft Pre-Lit Dunhill Fir Slim Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand, fir type and pre-lit, hinged, but a slim silhouette versus full Dunhill Fir; very close otherwise.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Identical brand and fir type, artificial Christmas tree, likely same or closely related model.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Kingswood Fir Pencil Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and fir type but pencil (slim) shape differs notably from full Dunhill Fir tree.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand full fir tree, likely similar silhouette and function, no pre-lit info reduces relevancy slightly.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Miniature size and pine species very different from full-sized Dunhill Fir artificial Christmas tree.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 7.5-ft Pre-Lit Traditional Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit artificial tree from same brand, likely full sized but unspecified fir type or branching details.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company North Valley Spruce Pencil Slim Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand slim pencil shape but spruce species differs in silhouette and branch fullness versus Dunhill Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company North Valley Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand full spruce tree, likely similar construction and use but different species from Dunhill Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Duxbury Tree 7.5 ft.
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand full artificial tree but unspecified fir type and features, likely similar size but uncertain similarity.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Slim Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and fir type as reference but slim silhouette versus full Dunhill Fir; core features very close.
